# mafs

The goal of mafs is to make it easy to test several forecast model available from the [forecast](https://github.com/robjhyndman/forecast)
package for a time series object


## Installation

You can install mafs from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sillasgonzaga/mafs")
```

## Example

```{r example}
data("AirPassengers")
select_forecast(AirPassengers, test_size = 12, horizon = 6, error = "MAPE")
```
